channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @ScottHansonDE Every hour on the news last night started with 45 minutes of more non-news about the queen. Followed by the standard 15 minutes on Trump. Then the next host comes on and does the same thing. I watched football instead.
item.source:markdown: @ScottHansonDE Every hour on the news last night started with 45 minutes of more non-news about the queen. Followed by the standard 15 minutes on Trump. Then the next host comes on and does the same thing. I watched football instead.

item.description: Oath Keepers: Leaked membership list includes police and politicians. https://t.co/yElpYE0Pot
item.source:markdown: Oath Keepers: Leaked membership list includes police and politicians. https://t.co/yElpYE0Pot

item.description:
People aren’t wearing masks, even at the pharmacist, the person who gave me my booster said she didn’t need one because she just got over her second bout with Covid. What? Unreal. Then it came to me, this is normal. It’s why even when the temperature..

in California is over 100 in lots of places, people are still pumping carbon into the atmosphere. Pakistan is drowning, and lake powell is dry. Business as usual. What was abnormal was the brief..

period when many made sacrifices to fight Covid. Now we just shrug it off, i guess?
item.source:markdown:
People aren’t wearing masks, even at the pharmacist, the person who gave me my booster said she didn’t need one because she just got over her second bout with Covid. What? Unreal. Then it came to me, this is normal. It’s why even when the temperature..
in California is over 100 in lots of places, people are still pumping carbon into the atmosphere. Pakistan is drowning, and lake powell is dry. Business as usual. What was abnormal was the brief..
period when many made sacrifices to fight Covid. Now we just shrug it off, i guess?

item.description: Seinfeld is right, if you celebrate before you win in sports, Fate comes down on you hard. I knew no good would come from Diaz’s arrogant entrances. https://t.co/MajMf0K11K

item.description: Americans think they know a lot about politics — and it’s bad for democracy that they’re so often wrong in their confidence. https://t.co/FwTs0IwBXM

item.description: @Gartenberg i'm going to take my afternoon nap now but will wake up if the earth starts rumbling.
item.source:markdown: @Gartenberg i'm going to take my afternoon nap now but will wake up if the earth starts rumbling.

item.description:
wow he's usually so measured. now the gloves are off?

i think they must've done a focus group that people are fed up waiting for them to do something about the political problem, stop trying to pretend it doesn't exist. https://t.co/meqUjpZPUl
item.source:markdown:
wow he's usually so measured. now the gloves are off?
i think they must've done a focus group that people are fed up waiting for them to do something about the political problem, stop trying to pretend it doesn't exist. https://t.co/meqUjpZPUl

item.description:
@sarahkendzior when we get up and sing god bless america at mlb games we're singing our fascist song.

nothing bad here, nothing we're ashamed of, nothing we've vowed never to do again.

@sarahkendzior when i was growing up -- this was the ideal of the american family we were all to measure ourselves against, including my family of refugees from the holocaust in europe.

there's a lot of "master race" in this picture. https://t.co/dpcsVA6vKV
Elected officials, police chiefs on leaked Oath Keepers list. https://t.co/9GnnsuCbow
item.source:markdown: Elected officials, police chiefs on leaked Oath Keepers list. https://t.co/9GnnsuCbow
